data.persona: I am a person on the run. I stole food from the lord's harvest. It is cold on the road these days. Soon it will be winter.
data.description:
You are in the Island.
This island is located in the center of a lake. It is smaller than a ship and covered in moss.
There's a moss here.
The castaway is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I must retrieve the moss because the castaway asked me to.
data.mid_motivation: The castaway tells me that he has transmutative powers and can turn the moss into food for us.
data.long_motivation: Creating a place to live, away from the lord's reach, will be much easier if the castaway and I can feed ourselves with a sustainable food supply.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: go the lake, after being chased away by the lord's guards.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the seemingly homeless man onto the island in the middle of the lake to escape the guards.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: hug the man, a castaway, for saving you; he begins to tell you about how he can transform organic matter into other organic matter using his magical powers.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: give the moss to the castaway.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: get the food that was created from the moss from the castaway.
